enb_long_title: Seventh Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) Eighth Session of the Ad Hoc Group on the Berlin Mandate
sentences: The non-group on policies and measures (P&Ms) met in the afternoon and further considered proposals from two groups of countries.
Some delegates reported little movement in positions.
A contact group was formed to discuss a paragraph under which Parties would aim to implement P&Ms in specified priority areas.
Another group was formed to consider paragraphs on cooperating to enhance the individual and combined effectiveness of P&Ms and on developing common performance indicators.
